title: Caramels

ingredients.content: 4 oz unsalted butter, plus extra to grease

preparations.content: Line a square baking dish (8 in. x 8 in.) with foil or parchment, grease with butter and set aside.

Place butter, brown sugar, corn syrup and cream of tartar into mixing bowl. Place Varoma dish instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid and cook <b>10 min/250°F/speed 3<b>. Add condensed milk and vanilla and place Varoma dish instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid and cook a further <b>15 min/250°F/speed 3<b>.
Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish. Refrigerate 3 hours until set. Cut into 80 pieces (approx. 1½ in. x ½ in.) and wrap caramels for gift giving. Store in the refrigerator.

hintsAndTricks: Nuts can be added to caramels e.g. pecan pieces, slivered almonds, or macadamia pieces. Add after last cooking stage and stir through with spatula.
